hints.content:
Let's use place value blocks to help us solve!

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/cac96b5246760668c5747729bf00624cea5ab541)

$600=\purpleD{6}\text{ hundreds} + \blueE{0}\text{ tens} + \maroonD{0}\text{ ones}$

If we break apart one hundred into tens, we will see that $1\text{ hundred}= 10\text{ tens}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/8c372c3bcf29ff756e7c045ec7186ec8af75d650)

So, $\purpleD6\text{ hundreds} = \blueE{60}\text{ tens}$

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/8c1eb7481671cdfcaa2308530499ba960adb84eb)

If we break apart one ten into ones, we will see that $1\text{ ten}= 10\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/e4fdf448967cc3f80b9adac27e4758efcc081e2c)

So, $\blueE{60}\text{ tens} = \maroonD{600}\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/4c2c5c6a02e0a313ba4489bf24d2438f27716e4a)

question.content:
**Complete the equations.**

 |  | |  | | | | |
-: | -: | :-: | -: | -: | -: | :-: | -: | -: | -: 
$600 =$|$6$ |$\text{ hundreds}$ |$+$| $0$ | $\text{ tens}$ | $+$ | $0$ |$\text{ ones}$
$600=$ | $0$| $\text{ hundreds}$ |$+$ | [[☃ numeric-input 1]] | $\text{tens}$ |$+$ | $0$ | $\text{ ones}$
$600=$ | $0$| $\text{ hundreds}$ |$+$ | $0$| $\text{ tens}$ |$+$ | [[☃ numeric-input 2]] | $\text{ones}$
